segments.text: hi , darling ! I have a one-month vacation saved up . How about a trip to Europe ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I could go for that . But I'm afraid our budget is a little tight this year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: oh , but I really need to leave this town for a change . Working day after day has worn me out . Do you have any other suggestions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: we should probably think about going somewhere that isn't too far away . How about the countryside ? There must be many interesting places , and we could enjoy the fresh air and the delicious local spec
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: wonderful ! I think that's a great idea . How soon until we can make this happen ? I can't wait !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: tomorrow I have an appointment with my dentist . What about next Monday ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: perfect . I'll start preparing tomorrow . If we're going to drive , I'll need to fill up the tank .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: no need . I think it's still plenty full . Even so , I'd rather travel by bus or train . It would cost much less than driving . Oil prices are soaring nowadays , you know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: we can take the train , that will be faster . I'll book the tickets tomorrow morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: great ! Oh , one more thing , don't forget to check the weather before we go . I'd hate to get caught in the rain .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: no problem . I'm really looking forward to the coming week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me , too . Now let's make a list for what we need to take with us .
segments.speaker: S2
